snippet.title: Rage in Peace - Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Rage in Peace is a side-scrolling adventure game that tells the story of Timmy Malinu, an emotionally numb 27 years old actuary who only has one dream that sets him apart from most people: to die asleep in his pajamas, in the warmth of home, in peace, and with no drama.

===================================================

Developed by Rolling Glory Jam

Published by Toge Productions

Available 2018 for PC and Mac

Songs featured: "Future Days" by L'Alphalpha

On one fateful day, a Grim Reaper appears out of nowhere, bearing news that Timmy will die today. With his head cut off. Help Timmy achieve his dream in his final day by avoiding all the traps and obstacles that mysteriously show up to stop him from dying the way he always wished to.

Learn from your mistakes and push forward as the universe works against you. In Rage in Peace, unravel the surrealistic story about life, death, and acceptance. Explore the colorful, imaginative world and creatures, hand-drawn with cartoon style that gives colors to Timmy's adventure. As you go, enjoy dozens of fantastic songs, created in collaboration with various indie bands, featuring a diverse list of genres.
